database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS_mouse embryo tissue section nanoDESI data dependent collection
entry.description: This is a dataset collected from multiple mouse embryo (E12.5 or E15.5) tissue sections using nanoDESI among year 2011 to 2013. Most of the tandem mass spectra in this dataset are not yet annotated but should contain many different types of phospholipids and small metabolites associated with embrogenesis. Some annotated spectra might be found in the PNAS 2013 110 (37), 14855-14860 by CC Hsu and et al.
